document.discussion_title: Atlas Reactor Closed Beta Code Giveaway
document.topic_text: Atlas Reactor Closed Beta Code Giveaway Grab your code while you still can! GameSpot is giving away hundreds of codes for the Atlas Reactor closed beta! What is Atlas Reactor? Atlas Reactor is a turn-based, team tactics based strategy title from Rift developer Trion Worlds. There are 4 types of actions you can choose to make during Decision Mode: Prep, Dash, Blast, and Move. These actions will play out in that order during their respective phases in Resolution Mode. Players choose their actions during “Decision Mode” and watch their actions resolve on screen during “Resolution Mode.” Did you enjoy this article? Upvote
